text.div:
Texture Modifier Codes

TextureModifier: Codes for food consistency types or texture modifications to apply to foods. This value set is composed of SNOMED CT (US Extension and Core) Concepts from SCTID 229961002 Food consistency types (substance) hierarchy and is provided as a suggestive example.

Copyright Statement: This value set includes content from SNOMED CT, which is copyright © 2002+ International Health Terminology Standards Development Organisation (IHTSDO), and distributed by agreement between IHTSDO and HL7. Implementer use of SNOMED CT is not covered by this agreement.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://snomed.info/sct
    Code Display
    228053002 Cut-up food
    439091000124107 Easy to chew food
    228049004 Chopped food
    441881000124103 Ground food
    441761000124103 Minced food
    441751000124100 Mashed food
    228059003 Soft food
    441791000124106 Strained food
    228055009 Liquidized food
    228056005 Lumpy food
    441771000124105 Moist food
    228057001 Semi-solid food
    228058006 Single texture food
    228060008 Solid food
